general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering, and milking stages are critical. Cover sugarcane rows with dry leaves. Apply sprinkler irrigation to reduce heat effect. Irrigate maize crop adequately. Install pheromone trap for brinjal. Treat okra seeds to prevent whitefly infestation. Proper harvesting and storage techniques for onion and mango hopper control.

advisory: Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering, and milking stages are critical. Avoid water deficit during these stages.
Top-dress with 4% potassium to protect from water scarcity.
High temperature increases water requirement. Irrigate adequately.
Apply 1g Streptocyclin in 10 liter water in root zone.
Install pheromone traps for management. Apply appropriate insecticides as necessary.
Mulch coconut leaves 1.8m around a coconut tree for water conservation.
Cover newly planted vegetable seedlings with paper caps during the day.
Harvest fingerlings from shallow ponds if water temperature rises to 30Â°C.
Manage tobacco caterpillar by dusting around the field and spraying insecticides.
Manage tobacco caterpillar by dusting around the field and spraying insecticides.
Treat okra seeds with Imidacloprid before sowing. Install yellow sticky traps.
Cut tops after harvesting and dry bulbs in well-ventilated room for storage.
Control mango hoppers by spraying appropriate insecticides.
